evidence.quote: Safety monitoring should align with the EMA-approved label, focusing on common side effects relevant to the specific therapy.
Ensure regular follow-up for any adverse reactions, and adjust based on individual patient needs and tolerability.

notes: The response correctly emphasizes adherence to the EMA-approved label and provides general guidance on safety monitoring. It avoids off-label suggestions and maintains a professional tone.
